dashboard.label: Saved Search Info
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_zH98NPlh":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"# $signature_info:result.signature$

## App: 
$signature_info:result.app$

## Enabled: 
$signature_info:result.enabled$

## Description:
$signature_info:result.description$

## Search:
```
$signature_info:result.search$
```

## Annotations:

- Analytic Story: $signature_info:result.analytic_story$
- Impact: $signature_info:result.impact$
- Confidence: $signature_info:result.confidence$
- Kill Chain Phases: $signature_info:result.kill_chain_phases$

- Mitre Attack: $signature_info:result.mitre_attack$
- CIS20: $signature_info:result.cis20$
- NIST: $signature_info:result.nist$
- CVE: $signature_info:result.cve$

## Adaptive Response:

- Notable: $signature_info:result.action_notable$
- Risk: $signature_info:result.action_risk$

## Schedule:
- Cron: $signature_info:result.cron_schedule$
- Dispatch Latest Time: $signature_info:result.dispatch_latest_time$
- Dispatch Earliest Time:
$signature_info:result.dispatch_earliest_time$
- Dispatch Max Time:
$signature_info:result.dispatch_max_time$
- Is scheduled: $signature_info:result.is_scheduled$

## ID: 
$signature_info:result.id$
"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_ktnPvBqG":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup SavedSearchesInfo-SignatureLookup
| search enabled = "$status$"
| fields app","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"enableSmartSources":true},"name":"signatures_app"},"ds_8MYtUYqT":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup SavedSearchesInfo-SignatureLookup
| search signature = "$signature$"
`SavedSearchesInfo-ExpandAnnotations`
| eval enabled = if(enabled = "1", "Yes", "No"), action_notable = if(action.notable = "1", "Yes", "No"), action_risk = if(action.notable = "1", "Yes", "No"), is_scheduled = if(is_scheduled = "1", "Yes", "No")
| fillnull dispatch_max_time value=0","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"enableSmartSources":true},"name":"signature_info"},"ds_7j4pdBtA":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup SavedSearchesInfo-SignatureLookup
